'''Ancient Forging Blueprint''' is a Quest Item obtained during the Event Quest ''[[The Palace, Dyed in Black (Quest)|The Palace, Dyed in Black]]'' during the [[Hues of the Violet Garden]] Event.

==Trivia==
*The translation of the blueprint sections as ''[[Inazuman Language]] - Japanese (English)'' read:
**TANZU SEKVEIZU — ''"Tanzou sekkeizu"'' ("Forging blueprint")
**ZAIR YOU — ''"Zairyou"'' ("Material")
**HAKUTE TSX — ''"Haku tetsu"'' ("[[White Iron Chunk|White Iron]]")
**SHOUKA KOTSUZUI — ''"Shouka kotsuzui"'' ("[[Crystal Marrow]]")
**SUISHO — ''"Suishou"'' ("[[Crystal Chunk|Crystal]]")
**KESEK IKA — ''"Kessekika"'' ("[[Dendrobium]]")
**MURASAK ISUISHO — ''"Murasaki suisho"'' ("[[Amethyst Lump|Amethyst]]")
**YAIBA — ''"Yaiba"'' (Blade-(cutting)-edge" of a katana blade)
**HIRA — ''"Hira"'' (Middle part of a katana blade, between cutting-edge and the middle ridge)
**SHIN OGI CHI — ''"Shinogi-ji"'' (Rear part of a katana blade, between back and middle ridge)
